response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your daily experiences. Given its high-quality standards and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $120 to you. For a limited time, I'm extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $150. This is an opportunity to experience the best without compromising on quality or value.
